custom_css_array.single_post_title_typography: .single-post .aux-primary .hentry .entry-title{ font-family:'Poppins'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:30px; font-weight:bold; line-height:43px; letter-spacing:-0.6px; }
custom_css_array.single_post_info_typography: .single-post .hentry .entry-info{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:16px; font-weight:400; text-transform:capitalize; line-height:19px; }
custom_css_array.single_post_meta_typography: .single-post .hentry footer.entry-meta .entry-tax{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:16px; font-weight:bold; text-transform:capitalize; font-style:normal; line-height:19px; }
custom_css_array.single_post_meta_terms_typography: .single-post .hentry footer.entry-meta .entry-tax a, .single-post .hentry footer.entry-meta .entry-tax i{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(207, 207, 207); font-size:16px; font-weight:400; text-transform:capitalize; text-decoration:none; line-height:19px; }
custom_css_array.comment_forms_button_typo: #commentform .form-submit input[type="submit"]{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size:16px; font-weight:400; text-transform:none; text-decoration:underline; line-height:19px; }
custom_css_array.comment_author_typo: .aux-commentlist .comment-author .fn, .aux-commentlist .comment-author .fn a{ font-family:'Poppins'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:20px; font-weight:bold; line-height:28px; }
custom_css_array.comment_info_typo: .aux-commentlist .comment .comment-author time a{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); font-size:15px; font-weight:400; line-height:19px; }
custom_css_array.product_setting_section_shop_page_bread_: .woocommerce-page .aux-breadcrumbs > span, .woocommerce-page .aux-breadcrumbs > span a{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(207, 207, 207); font-size:16px; font-weight:500; line-height:19px; }
custom_css_array.product_setting_section_shop_page_result: .woocommerce-page .woocommerce-result-count{ font-family:'Poppins'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:20px; font-weight:bold; text-transform:capitalize; line-height:30px; }
custom_css_array.product_setting_section_shop_page_produc: .aux-shop-archive .products-loop .aux-shop-meta-fields span{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); font-size:16px; font-weight:400; line-height:19px; }

.aux-shop-archive .products-loop .price .amount, .aux-shop-archive .products-loop .price ins .amount{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:25px; font-weight:bold; line-height:30px; }
.aux-shop-archive .products-loop .loop-tools-wrapper .button{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:16px; font-weight:500; text-decoration:underline; line-height:19px; }
custom_css_array.sidebar_common_widget_title_typography: .aux-sidebar .widget-title{ font-family:'Poppins'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:20px; font-weight:bold; text-transform:capitalize; line-height:28px; letter-spacing:-0.8px; }
custom_css_array.product_setting_section_single_appearanc: .single-product .aux-shop-meta-field span{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); font-size:15px; font-weight:400; line-height:19px; }
.single-product .entry-title{ font-family:'Poppins'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:35px; font-weight:bold; line-height:49px; letter-spacing:-0.6px; }
.single-product .price .amount, .single-product .price ins .amount{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:25px; font-weight:bold; line-height:35px; }
.single-product .cart .auxshp-add-to-cart{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:15px; font-weight:bold; text-transform:capitalize; line-height:19px; }

.single-product .auxshp-cats-wrapper .auxshp-meta-terms, .single-product .auxshp-cats-wrapper .auxshp-meta-terms a{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(207, 207, 207); font-size:16px; font-weight:500; line-height:19px; }
.woocommerce-page .woocommerce-tabs .tabs li a{ font-family:'Poppins'; color:rgb(207, 207, 207); font-size:16px; font-weight:500; line-height:23px; letter-spacing:-0.6px; }
.single-product .woocommerce-tabs .tabs-content{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:16px; font-weight:500; line-height:23px; letter-spacing:-0.6px; }
custom_css_array.product_related_posts_price_typo: .aux-widget-related-products .auxshp-entry-main .price .amount , .aux-widget-related-products .auxshp-entry-main .price ins .amount{ font-family:'Montserrat'; color:rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size:25px; font-weight:bold; line-height:30px; }
